amendment.description: To amend the short title to name the bill in honor of the late Ronald W. Reagan, the 40th President of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3432 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3432 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6717; text: CR S6717) To amend the short title to name the bill in honor of the late Ronald W. Reagan, the 40th President of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3432 proposed by Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3432 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
